website_summaries.verdict: The best way to make your gift table pop.
pros: Kit includes a 5 balloon bouquet and a helpful “Cards & Gifts” table sign
Foil balloons are durable and stay afloat for weeks when filled with helium
Purple and green colors are ideal for gender-neutral party
cons: You will need to purchase your own string or ribbon for the balloons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a Parisian themed birthday party for my mother...we filled them with your basic helium tank from Walmart and two and an half months later three of them are still up! They were packaged well, and not damaged. Have had a bad experience before with other sellers where half the items wouldn’t inflate, these were perfect and made a great look.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Balloons
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't normally write a review for balloons, but these were impressive. They lasted longer than expected, and the largest balloon is still full of helium a month after the party.
customer_reviews.author: spacyz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome! The largest one was bigger than I expected and it looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Bree C.

customer_reviews.title: Picture is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows 1 large balloon, 2 smaller printed balloons and 2 solid color balloons, I only received 1 large balloon and the 2 smaller printed balloons. One of the smaller balloons had the bottom ripped off, so was unable to use, so only received 2 usable balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: These balloons were perfect for a friends retirement party. Arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Deezer6

customer_reviews.title: Ad deception
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression these were blow up balloons. When I received them they were helium balloons which I could not use due to the Virus. No mention of helium in the Amazon ad.
customer_reviews.author: Scott reithel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The bigger balloon had a hole and air escaped from it as soon as I started blowing it.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: EVERYTHING YOU NEED IN ONE PACKAGE!
customer_reviews.text: This was a beautiful display. Even the store that blew them up for me wanted to know where I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sorry not quite what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Well when I took in to get filled up with helium, 3 of the balloons had holes in them. That was disappointing on my son's wedding day. The car balloon is cute. A little smaller than I expected. For me I wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Miss J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful balloons, great for baptism party. Last very long time, even month after.
customer_reviews.author: Justyna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Love that it came with balloon weight! Exactly as pictured. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Easy if you inflate at home
customer_reviews.text: We have the helium tank at our house so these were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Gleason

product_meta.title: Andaz Press Balloon Bouquet Party Kit with Gold Cards & Gifts Sign, Baby Brights Baby Shower Foil Mylar Balloon Decorations, 1-Set
product_meta.description: Color:Baby Brights ThemeAndaz Press is a premier designer and manufacturer of custom party decor and personalized gifts. Andaz Press products are made with the highest quality paper, materials, and inks.
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: 1 large balloon bouquet, and 1 gold ink party sign, designed by Andaz Press.
PERFECT to place on a gifts or dessert table to add a unique touch to your special event!
PROPERTIES: Sign is printed with gold ink, which shines in the light. Balloons are high quality. Helium and string not included.

FLAT RATE SHIPPING: Fill your cart with Andaz Press items, and pay ONE LOW SHIPPING RATE. Expedited and 2-day shipping also available! All orders, including custom, ship within 1-2 business days from California.
Andaz Press. Party sign is an original design by Andaz Press . All rights reserved.
